snippet.title: Amiga 500 Longplay [351] Ivanhoe
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: SCHLAUCHI

Based on the medieval legend of Sir Ivanhoe, a knight who fights to restore King Richard the Lionheart to the throne. The game is a platformer where the player controls Ivanhoe as he battles his way through various levels, fighting enemies and collecting treasure.

Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
